tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable due to the use of a compromised dependency, as described in CVE-2024-21538. The issue arises from `child-process-promise`, which relies on an insecure version of `cross-spawn`. This has been addressed by migrating from the unmaintained `child-process-promise` to `promisify-child-process`, eliminating the transitive vulnerability in `cross-spawn`.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `detox` library to the patch version.
